user.biography:
Ridgewood, Queens
M-Th: 3p-10p | F-Sat: 12p-12a | Sun: 12p-10p
▪️
DUMBO, Brooklyn
M-W: 12p-11p | Th: 12p-12a | F: 12p-1a | Sat: 10a-1a | Sun: 10a-11p

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in Evil Twin Brewing. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
The perfect brunch seltzer is now available in 4pks at both taprooms! Be sure to grab a pack for tomorrow’s Sunday brunch 🍊🥂 And don’t forget to check out the @evilwaternyc pop-up happening this weekend in Ridgewood! Taproom hours in bio.

EVIL WATER PASTRY SELTZER - VANILLA MIMOSA
Craft Hard Seltzer / 5% / The perfect balance of fresh-squeezed OJ, delicate vanilla bean, and Chardonnay must. Juicy, effervescent, semi-sweet.

EVIL WATER PASTRY SELTZER - MIMOSA
Craft Hard Seltzer / 5% / Mellow flavors of Chardonnay must and fresh squeezed pulpy OJ. Juicy, effervescent, semi-dry.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC on August 14, 2021 tagging @caroline.jpeg, @firstrun, and @tracksmithrunning. May be an image of 2 people, people standing and outdoors.

node.text: The first @tracksmithrunning x @eviltwinbrewingnyc meet has kicked off this morning! They will be hosting long runs every Saturday morning starting at 8am. Bag drop & pre-run coffee from @seycoffee starts at ETNYC Dumbo, heading into Manhattan with pacing groups, water stops, and delicious beers once finished. All runners are welcome as the route is easy to extend or shorten. Find more details at the link in our bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC on August 14, 2021 tagging @caroline.jpeg, @firstrun, and @tracksmithrunning. May be an image of 2 people, people standing and outdoors.

Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in Evil Twin Brewing with @caroline.jpeg, and @fantastic.beers. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
You’ll want a few of these for today’s heatwave 🔥🍻 Available for purchase now!

FANTASTIC LAGER
Lime Lager / 5% / Brewed with Tuborg yeast and Hersbrucker hops. Conditioned on American oak and key lime. Crispy, pithy, crushable.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in DUMBO. May be an image of indoor.

node.text: We love getting work done at the DUMBO taproom during coffee hours ☕️ Each seat has a plug-in available plus coffee and pastries are being served ‘til 2pm. Beer starts at noon, so be sure to stay for a lager or two 😉

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in Evil Twin Brewing. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Our newest Continental Breakfast Sour just hit the canning line and will be available for purchase starting tomorrow when the taprooms open! Preorder for shipping and Ridgewood pickup kick off on 5pm tonight on the webshop.

CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST SOUR BLACKBERRY YOGHURT VERSION
Breakfast Sour Ale / 7.5% / Robust notes of Ethiopian coffee, juicy blackberries, and breakfast yoghurt. Sweet, roasty, smoothie-like.
$22/4pk

FANTASTIC LAGER
Lime Lager / 5% / Brewed with Tuborg yeast and Hersbrucker hops. Conditioned on American oak and key lime.
$14/4pk

SOMEONE JUST WALKED BY ME WITH A SURFBOARD IN PROSPECT PARK. WHERE ARE YOU GOING?
IPA / 7% / Double dry-hopped with Mosaic and Idaho 7 hops. Grassy, fresh, juicy.
$17/4pk

EVIL WATER PASTRY SELTZER - MIMOSA
Craft Hard Seltzer / 5% / Mellow flavors of Chardonnay must and fresh squeezed pulpy OJ. Juicy, effervescent, semi-dry.
$14/4pk

EVIL WATER PASTRY SELTZER - VANILLA MIMOSA
Craft Hard Seltzer / 5% / The perfect balance of fresh-squeezed OJ, delicate vanilla bean, and Chardonnay must. Juicy, effervescent, semi-sweet.
$14/4pk

BONE IN THE THROAT
By @rootandbranchbrewing
Multi-Oat/Wheat Double IPA / 8% / Brewed and dry-hopped with a blend of American hops.
$20/4pk - x4 4pk pp limit
Pickup only - proxies ok

🌿All new releases drop Friday at 12pm at Ridgewood & 2pm at DUMBO.
🌱New release preorders open Thurs at 5pm on the webshop, (link in bio). *Preorder for Ridgewood pickup only*
🪴All online orders must be picked up within 3 days. Proxies okay.
🌵Shipping available for residents in NY/PA/DC/NH.
🍃Orders placed from Thur-Sun ship out Mon. Orders placed Mon-Wed ship out Thur.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC on August 11, 2021 tagging @asisnyc, and @asisrunningclub. May be an image of text that says 'FRIDAY THE 13th EVIL TWIN'.

node.text:
Join us at @asisnyc this coming Friday for a Friday the 13th party featuring an array of 20 of our beers and seltzers on tap from 6 PM on! This is actually the first time anyone outside of our own tap room has managed to get 20 different of our brews on at the same time!!

We will also be doing a 13K run (for Friday the 13th) with @asisrunning club. Evil Twin founder Jeppe @bjergsoe and his infamous son, the up and coming running star @melvinruns will join the run! Bag drop available at 6:45. Run to start promptly at 7 PM. All levels welcome!

We hope to see you there, it’s been too long!!

📸 @gnp_photos

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC on August 11, 2021 tagging @asisnyc, and @asisrunningclub. May be an image of text that says 'FRIDAY THE 13th EVIL TWIN'.

Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in Evil Twin Brewing with @evilwaternyc. May be an image of drink and text that says 'EVILWATER PASTRY PAST SELTZER EVILWATER PASTRY SELTZER VANILLA MIMOSA MIMOSA'.

node.text:
Keeping up the brunch theme this week with some mimosa-style seltzers 🍊🥂🍳☕️ Dropping Friday. All the deets live in the post below!

EVIL WATER PASTRY SELTZER - MIMOSA
Craft Hard Seltzer / 5% / Mellow flavors of Chardonnay must and fresh squeezed pulpy OJ. Juicy, effervescent, semi-dry.

EVIL WATER PASTRY SELTZER - VANILLA MIMOSA
Craft Hard Seltzer / 5% / The perfect balance of fresh-squeezed OJ, delicate vanilla bean, and Chardonnay must. Juicy, effervescent, semi-sweet.

🌿All new releases drop Friday at 12pm at Ridgewood & 2pm at DUMBO.
🌱New release preorders open Thurs at 5pm on the webshop, (link in bio). *Preorder for Ridgewood pickup only*
🪴All online orders must be picked up within 3 days. Proxies okay.
🌵Shipping available for residents in NY/PA/DC/NH.
🍃Orders placed from Thur-Sun ship out Mon. Orders placed Mon-Wed ship out Thur.

node.text:
One might say this is the lager of 2021… yes, we’re looking at you @fantastic.beers 😚

Available starting Friday. Release details below!

FANTASTIC LAGER
Lime Lager / 5% / Brewed with Tuborg yeast and Hersbrucker hops. Conditioned on American oak and key lime. Crispy, limey, crushable.

🌿All new releases drop Friday at 12pm at Ridgewood & 2pm at DUMBO.
🌱New release preorders open Thurs at 5pm on the webshop, (link in bio). *Preorder for Rodgewood pickup only*
🪴All online orders must be picked up within 3 days. Proxies okay.
🌵Shipping available for residents in NY/PA/DC/NH.
🍃Orders placed from Thur-Sun ship out Mon. Orders placed Mon-Wed ship out Thur.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in Evil Twin Brewing. May be an image of drink, outdoors and text that says 'EVILWATER'.

node.text:
Blue Raspberry 4pks can be picked up at either location or ordered online for shipping 💦

EVIL WATER - BLUE RASPBERRY
Hard Seltzer / 4.5% / A play off one of our favorite sour IPAs, What Even Is Blue Raspberry Anyway? Stone-fruity with notes of candied raspberry. Open gently, enjoy very cold.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in DUMBO. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text: The start of a new week calls for a mixed tray of beers ‘n frozens 🍹🍻 Both taprooms open today, see our bio for hours!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by EVIL TWIN BREWING NYC in Evil Twin Brewing. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
4pks of this juicy Triple IPA are available for local pickup at both taprooms! Preorder online for shipping or Ridgewood pickup (DUMBO preorder not available).

I THINK I’VE SAID THE WORDS BUSHWICK AND RAVES TOO MUCH BC I KEEP GETTING ADS FOR CHEAP BEER
Triple IPA / 10% / Double dry-hopped with Citra, El Dorado, and Galaxy hops. Distinct aromas of grapefruit, passion fruit, and orange zest.
